content:
The character used for empty space seems to be a space character, not a period as the statement says.

The statement could certainly do with specifying the coordinate system used. (x=width, y=height, in that order, 0-indexed, which way is up/left). I initially thought it could be enough with just the debug view, but a) it's only active on actual sprites, which is a minority of the space, and b) the hidden surrounding walls (while useful!) confuse the matter wrt 0/1-indexing.

Typo: [Switches] it's -> its

Presentation: needs linefeeds between the different lines of the input format.

o/

weird sprite bug
https://imgur.com/a/7Gw64nA

fix it
Thanks for the feedback, I'll come back to this in the afternoon.

I corrected your points, but can't upload it. CG is working on it.
Free cells are dots, except for the 5 introduction tests, where I used spaces :(

edit: done
